title: UPDATE: Teen dies following accidental shooting
content:
MILLER COUNTY - UPDATE: A 14 year-old has died following an accidental shooting on Monday.
The teen is identified as Destin Wallace from Fouke, AR
Deputies say Wallace was shot by his friend accidentally.
Miller County Deputies are continuing their investigation.
A 14 year-old is in critical condition after being accidentally shot by his friend.
It happened late Monday night.
Miller County Sheriff's Office says they were called to a home on Highway 71 by a parent saying her child had accidentally shot his friend.
Deputies found the male 14-year-old in critical condition.
The teen was airlifted to LSUS medical center and is in critical condition.
The Miller County Sheriff Office Criminal Investigation Unit responded to the scene and are currently investigating the incident.
